title: Workshop on AI-Based Adaptive Science Curriculum Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Enhancing AI-driven science education design capabilities tailored to individual learning patterns and progress.

learning_goals: The principles of AI-based adaptive learning frameworks and their application cases in science subjects can be explained.
Strategies for utilizing AI tools to design science lessons reflecting learners’ personalized needs can be suggested.
The process of analyzing formative assessment data and providing feedback to AI systems can be demonstrated.

resources: Sample datasets for AI education platforms
AI tool list integrated with science curriculum

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
